subject: Sports Injuries
Football
lead_paragraph: Along with running back Ahmad Bradshaw, guard Chris Snee and center David Baas are banged up heading into a game critical to the postseason chances of the reigning N.F.L. champions.
snippet: Along with running back Ahmad Bradshaw, guard Chris Snee and center David Baas are banged up heading into a game critical to the postseason chances of the reigning N.F.L. champions.
